sn51.17:4.1: “Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atītamaddhānaṃ samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhosuṃ—
sn51.17:4.2: ekopi hutvā bahudhā ahesuṃ, bahudhāpi hutvā eko ahesuṃ;
sn51.17:4.4: tirokuṭṭaṃ tiropākāraṃ tiropabbataṃ asajjamānā agamaṃsu, seyyathāpi ākāse;
sn51.17:4.6: udakepi abhijjamāne agamaṃsu, seyyathāpi pathaviyaṃ;
sn51.17:4.7: ākāsepi pallaṅkena kamiṃsu, seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇo;
sn51.17:4.8: imepi candimasūriye evaṃmahiddhike evaṃmahānubhāve pāṇinā parimasiṃsu parimajjiṃsu;
sn51.17:4.9: yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṃ vattesuṃ, sabbe te catunnaṃ iddhipādānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā.
sn51.17:5.1: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, anāgatamaddhānaṃ samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhossanti—
sn51.17:5.2: ekopi hutvā bahudhā bhavissanti, bahudhāpi hutvā eko bhavissanti;
sn51.17:5.4: tirokuṭṭaṃ tiropākāraṃ tiropabbataṃ asajjamānā gamissanti, seyyathāpi ākāse;
sn51.17:5.7: ākāsepi pallaṅkena kamissanti, seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇo;
sn51.17:5.8: imepi candimasūriye evaṃmahiddhike evaṃmahānubhāve pāṇinā parimasissanti parimajjissanti;
sn51.17:5.9: yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṃ vattissanti, sabbe te catunnaṃ iddhipādānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā.
sn51.17:6.1: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhonti—
sn51.17:6.2: ekopi hutvā bahudhā honti, bahudhāpi hutvā eko honti;
sn51.17:6.4: tirokuṭṭaṃ tiropākāraṃ tiropabbataṃ asajjamānā gacchanti, seyyathāpi ākāse;
sn51.17:6.7: ākāsepi pallaṅkena kamanti, seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇo;
sn51.17:6.8: imepi candimasūriye evaṃmahiddhike evaṃmahānubhāve pāṇinā parimasanti parimajjanti;
sn51.17:6.9: yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṃ vattenti, sabbe te catunnaṃ iddhipādānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattāti.
sn51.17:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti, vīriyasamādhi … pe …
sn51.17:7.5: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atītamaddhānaṃ samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhosuṃ—
sn51.17:7.7: yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṃ vattesuṃ, sabbe te imesaṃyeva catunnaṃ iddhipādānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā.
sn51.17:8.1: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, anāgatamaddhānaṃ samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhossanti—
sn51.17:8.3: yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṃ vattissanti, sabbe te imesaṃyeva catunnaṃ iddhipādānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā.
sn51.17:9.1: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhonti—
sn51.17:9.3: yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṃ vattenti, sabbe te imesaṃyeva catunnaṃ iddhipādānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā”ti.
